sentence.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway has recently been identified as a tumor suppressor gene in a variety of cancers, yet the role of transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway in renal cell carcinoma (response to hydroperoxide) remained to be elusive.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: These results indicate that transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway acts as a tumor suppressor by activating negative regulation of intracellular estrogen receptor signaling pathway, and then suppressing the expression of estrogen receptor, in addition to tumor migration and invasion.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
negative regulation of intracellular estrogen receptor signaling pathway
